other_title: カードファイト!! ヴァンガードG ギアースクライシス編 (Japanese)
plot: A major event known as "G Quest" is to be organized by the Federation of International Vanguard Associations (FIVA) this autumn. Those who conquer six Branch Quests will be honored the title "Generation Master" as well as the chance to become a Clan Leader. While members of TRY3 are all excited by new goals ahead, a massive conspiracy that would lead to the destruction of Vanguard has been secretly set in motion.
ending_theme: "Don't Look Back" by Aimi & Haruka Kudou
